item.description:
We are happy to announce that Sages and the Langdon Library will be hosting an event for International Tabletop Day on March 30th 2013!

International Tabletop Day is a clebration of Tabletop by Wil Wheaton (Star Trek, Bing Bang Theory, Leverage) and it's one year anniversary. But it is also a day to get together and play/learn games with new and old friends.

At the event we will be focusing on designer board and card games. With designer board & card games the game designer gets front billing on the box just like the author of a book!

People will be available to teach games and there will be copies of some of the best designer games on hand for you to learn and play.

If there is a specific game you would like to know about, or try please let me know and I will do my best to bring it along.

This event is open to all ages and familys are welcome.

Gaming will start promptly at 12pm and games will go until 4:00pm.

Hope you can join us and if you have any questions please dont hesitate to emailwayne@sagesofrpg.com

Brought to you by:

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: International Tabletop Day at the Langdon Library!
